long_description: Delivering a lightweight yet responsive feel for all-mountain riding, the Union Atlas snowboard bindings feature flexible highbacks that let you flex forward or lean back easily for amazing control. Bases are made with high-quality DuPont(TM) Zytel(R) ST nylon; they're strong, supportive and secure, and offer balanced comfort and response. Baseplates are designed to be supremely strong with the smallest footprint possible; this promotes free, even board flex for sweeter response, board control and durability. Extruded aluminum heel cups reduce weight and maintain strength; dual-density EVA bushings offering vibration damping that allows you to feel the natural board flex. Multizone highbacks offer three different zones of flex for a transitional top-to-bottom flex, with the top third being the softest and the bottom third the stiffest. 3D Direct-Connect ankle straps eliminate elasticity and evenly distribute pressure across feet and ankles for increased comfort and board control. Multi-position toe straps offer an improved and updated fit for a wide range of boots. Magnesium buckles are 4 times stronger than aluminum with only half the weight. Union Atlas bindings are compatible with Burton The Channel M6 snowboards.
